name: Book of Demons (itch)
description:
Book of Demons is a hack & slash distilled to its purest form. Devilishly charming and fun as hell. Slay the armies of darkness in the dungeons below the Old Cathedral and save the terror-stricken Paperverse from the clutches of the Archdemon himself.

Game Features

  • Unique hack & slash mechanics
  • Slay 3 epic bosses: The Cook, The Antipope and The Archdemon
  • Items, spells, skills and stats all unified as magical cards
  • Decide the length of quests
  • Over 70 types of monsters
  • 3 playable classes
  • Beautiful paper art style
  • Extra challenge in freeplay modes: hard, nightmare and massacre!

Learn more about the game at: http://www.return2games.com
